detail_desc: T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.

Short, boxy-style jacket in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button and discreet diagonal front pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short, thin shoulder straps and deep armholes. Loose-fitting.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer at the front with ties at the hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low waist, wide sides, medium coverage at the back and folded, glued, scalloped edges.
Trousers in woven fabric with one welt back pocket, a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Tier on the skirt for added width.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck with a gathered seam.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative lace trim at the top with a small bow at the front. Press-studs at the crotch and elastication around the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pointelle vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and a small satin bow at the front.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Low waist and skinny legs.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Earrings in plastic and metal with hoops at the bottom. Length 5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.
Classic jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves with a jacquard-knit motif and a ribbed hem.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with embroidery at the top and on the back. Collar, buttons down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and a press-stud at the cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in Italian wool with pleats, a zip fly with a button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Long jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Imitation leather card holder with four card compartments and one note compartment. Size 7x10 cm.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Single-breasted jacket in a lightweight weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Leather slides with a padded, quilted foot strap. Leather linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Gently fitted shirt in cotton poplin with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with one large zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. One zipped inner compartment into which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap for when the bag is folded up. Size 5x18x32 cm. Size when folded up 3x11.5x15.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders,long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Straight-style vest top in soft jersey with a round neckline and visible seam down the back.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in a soft cotton blend with a glittery text print. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a sewn-on extended hem in woven fabric with fake buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a glittery print motif front and back, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Jumper knitted in a soft, textured cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Jumper in a fine-knit wool blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Scarf in a soft, textured knit.
Fine-knit T-shirt in a sturdy cotton blend with a stand-up collar in a double layer and slits in the sides.
Long linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and string back.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats at the front and gentle gathers at the back. Unlined.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, a ribbed section on the inside at the back of the waist and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Round metal earrings with fabric tassels. Length 9 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a wide, gathered neckline front and back and lace sections over the shoulders.
Small cylindrical shoulder bag in fabric with a zip at the top and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 11x17.5 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a decorative bow on the shaft. Unlined.
